changes.title: Added a list of recent updates, accessed through the new "Updates" item in the toolbar.
Added an option to export data to Roam Research from the user page.
Fixed bug where adding a parent would collapse all items.
Added keyboard shortcut Alt+F for "Find" action.
Changed link UI so that links are now shown with a bullet next to them.
Made my task list publicly available here: https://thinktool.io/work.html
Changed bullets such that collapsed bullets are now rings, and expanded bullets are filled discs.
Made it possible to toggle whether or not the toolbar is shown.
Show a bullet graphic next to the note that is currently zoomed in, instead of highlighting it in bold.
Improve display of update list on devices with narrow screens.
Created a very basic prototype of an offline desktop client, currently just containing the demo.
Remove link to user page in demo.
